### Load packages and data

```{r load-packages, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse) 
```

```{r load-data, message=FALSE}
nobel <- read_csv("data/nobel.csv")
```

```{r get_more_info}
library(skimr)
skim(nobel)
```
## Exercises

### Exercise 1

There are 935 observations and 26 variables in the nobel laureates dataset.

```{r variable-details}
spec(nobel)
count(nobel)
nrow(nobel)
ncol(nobel)
```

### Exercise 2

```{r new-data-frame}
nobel %>%
  mutate(nobel_living = country, gender, died_date) %>%
  filter(gender != "org",)
```
